BR_text.BRdescription:
The extension of my checkpoint files are .cptk, not .ckpt.
 Is this a typo at this line?
 
 
 
 ml-agents/ml-agents/mlagents/trainers/tf_policy.py
 
 
          Line 325
       in
       66c9f76
 
 
 
 
 
 
  last_checkpoint = self.model_path + "/model-" + str(steps) + ".cptk"

comments_0.comment_text:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yosider>@yosider</denchmark-link>
  -- I think you're right that the checkpoints should be .  I'll bring this issue up with the team.

comments_1.comment_text:
Thanks for the report <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yosider>@yosider</denchmark-link>
 .  I've made the fix in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/pull/3470>#3470</denchmark-link>
 .  Going to close this issue, but please let us know if you run into any more problems.
